Room.Name: Mulberry Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking on Mulberry road, which goes between Kista and Oceancrest.
Room.LongDescription: The side of the road is lined with Great Mulberry trees, which are old trees that turn the road into a wonderful panarama of vivid colors in the autumn when the leaves turn and fall to the ground. This walk is well patrolled and is considered a very safe road. Young lovers often stroll here in the moonlight.
